pageContent: Introduction: The treatment of localised prostate cancer seeks to minimise the impact on sexual function and urinary continence. In this respect, therapy with high-intensity focused ultrasound offers important results. We present our experience with this technique in 2 Spanish centres.

metaData.source:
A prospective clinical trial of HIFU hemiablation for clinically localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26597660/
